body.name: Everlasting Comfort FSA HSA Approved Memory Foam Seat Cushion - Stadium Seat Cushion, Bleacher Cushion for Indoor, Outdoor Use - Extra Wide, Thick Seat Pad for Comfortable Sitting - Work, Car, Travel

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN products are tested for harmful substances and made in safer workplaces with reduced environmental impacts.

features: THE PERFECT SIZED SEAT CUSHION: Some chair cushions are shaped oddly or are simply too small to fit your office chair or bleacher seat correctly. Our chair pad's large size (18"x17"x3") fits most desk chairs and stadium seats perfectly

GEL MEMORY FOAM CUSHION: A step above other memory foam seat cushions, we've incorporated gel into every inch of our premium memory foam chair cushion. The gel not only helps to distribute weight more evenly for effective pressure relief, but it also ensures you stay cool through long sitting sessions

VENTILATED OFFICE CHAIR CUSHION: Not only does our stadium seat cushion feature gel infused memory foam, it's designed with strategically placed ventilation holes to allow your body heat to escape, keeping you cool

SUPPORT FOR YOUR BACK, HIPS, COCCYX, AND LEGS: We designed our bleacher pad to relieve pain and pressure from your lower back, thighs, hips, butt, and tailbone. Its ergonomic design combined with thick premium gel infused memory foam supports your body, easing any discomfort

CERTIFIED SAFE MATERIALS: In our commitment to providing you with high quality items, our computer chair cushion has been tested by OEKO-TEX to earn their coveted STANDARD 100 label; meaning every component of our chair pillow is certified safe and harmless

VERSATILE, PORTABLE MEMORY FOAM SEAT CUSHION: Ergonomically designed and lightweight, our butt pillow can be used on various types of seating. Ideal as a bleacher chair, stadium seat pad, car seat cushion, gaming chair pillow, and airplane seat cushion

HEAT RESPONSIVE: Designed with heat responsive technology, the office chair pad uses your body heat to soften and adapt to your lower body curves. This helps provide you with the personalized comfort and support most office chairs lack

FEATURES A BREATHABLE, SOFT COVER: Our ergonomic chair cushion is truly built for comfort, complete with a soft to the touch cover that's enjoyable to sit on for hours on end. The mesh cover is also breathable, allowing air to circulate in and out, never trapping heat. Ideal for outdoor events

NON SLIP BOTTOM: Reinforced with a non slip bottom, the textured nubs on the underside of our tailbone pain relief cushion stays put, even if you shift about in your seat or go from a sitting to standing position

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: Lifetime Replacement Policy. If you have any issues at all with your Everlasting Comfort Office Chair Cushion, then contact us and we will issue a free replacement, for life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No longer experience discomfort and pain when sitting for extended periods. The Everlasting Comfort Office Chair Cushion is composed of gel infused memory foam that cradles your coccyx, butt, legs, hips, and back for exceptionally supportive comfort. Its large size (18x17x3”) ensures it fits any seat you desire, including office chairs, patio furniture, stadium seats, and your car driver seat. The breathable cover is machine washable, while the non-slip bottom stays in place no matter how often you shift or change positions. Work, play, or commute in total comfort with our office chair seat cushion.

100 Percent Gel Infused Memory Foam Our computer chair cushion is made using pure memory foam that's been infused with gel to support your butt, tailbone, legs, and lower back. It promotes proper posture by cradling your lower body and minimizing pressure that causes discomfort and pain due to extended sitting. Non Slip Bottom Ensures It Stays Put No matter if you place the chair pad on an office chair, gaming chair, patio chair, car seat, or airplane seat, the non slip rubber bottom ensures it will stay in place. No more slipping, falling, or constant readjusting required. Machine Washable, Dryer Safe Cover Easily unzip the cover on the back of the tailbone pain relief cushion, remove the memory foam, and toss the cover into the wash. Machine wash with cold water. Dryer safe on air fluff or low heat.

Seat Cool & Comfortable Reduce Back Pain Rest Your Feet in Luxury Wrist & Forearm Support Material Gel Infused Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam with Gel Insert Features Cooling ventilation holes Dual adjustable straps Doubles as a foot rocker Double sided fasteners for secure fit Ideal For Tailbone, lower back, legs Upper, middle, lower back Feet, legs, lower back Elbows, forearms, wrists Dimensions 17”x14”x2” 13”x4”13” 17”x5”x10” 9.5”x3”x1.5” Machine Washable? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Office Chair Cushion Benefits? Sitting for extended periods of time can cause discomfort in the back, hips, and coccyx. Without proper cushioning, that discomfort becomes increasingly agitated. Adding a chair pad to your office accessories lineup can help take the pressure off your lower body. The added ventilation holes and breathable mesh cover allow you to sit cool and comfortable. Benefits of gel memory foam? Memory foam uses your body heat to adapt and contour to fit your precise shape. A gel memory foam chair cushion takes into account the amount of weight applied and provides support where you need it most. This customized fit reduces pain and facilitates faster recovery times from lower body injuries. Added ventilation holes in the seat cushion allows body heat to escape, so you can continue to work, game, or study without worry of overheating. Will it help my back pain? Unsupportive chairs are detrimental to your back health as they put excess pressure on your spine and lead to poor sitting posture. Using an office chair seat cushion while sitting for long stretches helps to reduce compression in the spine for better alignment and pain relief. Will it help tailbone fatigue? A chair that lacks the proper support can lead to poor posture while sitting, creating excess pressure on your back, tailbone, and hips. Adding an ergonomic office seat cushion is a simple way to upgrade your chair to make it more comfortable and supportive. How to wash the seat cushion? We made it easy to keep your desk chair cushion fresh. Simply unzip the cover and pull away from gel memory foam. Toss the cover into the wash on the gentle cycle with cold water. Tumble dry on low or no heat. Do not wash the memory foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit in my transport chair
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable cushion. Can increase the time I am able to sit in the transport chair. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair pad
reviews.reviewText: After reading A LOT of reviews and part descriptions, I landed on this pad and I’m glad I did. This was technically built for wheelchair seats, I believe, but this has been the best office chair pad I’ve owned to date.I’d bought a new monitor setup that raised my monitors higher than I prefer them and my chair is already at highest adjustment, so I was specifically looking for a pad that would also boost me up a little bit.5-6 months in, this pad has been perfect for my needs. It sits me a little higher, Its comfortable, it hasn’t flattened at all yet. Someone even borrowed my chair one day while while I was out and asked me all about this pad when I got back. They wanted to know where I got it & how much because when they sat in my seat they were surprised by how comfy it was (in our office everyone has to use the same standard office chair, so pads like these are essential)..I don’t foresee this wearing out too quickly. It seems like a quality product. I highly recommend this pad. Def worth the comfort if you sit at a desk for long hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super stiff when cold. But overall great seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: Use them in a Tahoe that the seats always were too firm for me. They work great for those long drives. They are very stiff and hard when cold but soften up when they warm up and then they're fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought various ones for asia trip. This one worked great i returned the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this on my faux leather dining chairs.
reviews.reviewText: Before I purchased this cushion, the cushion on my chair basically wore out. It was like sitting on concrete. After having the cushion replaced, I decided to add a memory foam cushion for comfort and to preserve the chair cushion. This memory foam cushion has served that purpose well. The chair is more comfortable, the chair has held up better, as has this cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a pretty decent cushion.
reviews.reviewText: The cushion is comfy yet supportive. Semi firm but not hard that it makes your bones sore. I am 135LBS. Prefect size for my desk chair. I will order the other cushion they sell that is shaped to your body. It’s the “upgraded” version. For $57. I am picky about butt cushions but I am not that heavy. So this one worked out great for me. This is why I will try another one of their products: gel-infused cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable but triggered sciatica
reviews.reviewText: I've had a much more firm seat cushion with a back end divet for years now for my computer chair and haven't had any sciatica. I got this because I wanted something softer with more cushion after trying it at my mom's. Well I only started using this a couple days ago but already I am messed up with pain. Last night my sciatica was so severe I couldn't walk. However, my mother who has severe back pain uses this and loves it so maybe it's a me issue. It is incredibly soft and comfortable but unfortunately I will have to return it and go back to my firm cushion with the divet. Maybe if you don't sit a lot it won't make a difference, not really sure why this caused problems for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Excelente calidad en eñ producto suave y comodo. Cubre muy bien el sillon.
Llevo ocupando 15 días y no se ha deformado.Muy transpirable.Compraría otro.

reviews.reviewTitle: Todavía no lo uso a tiempo completo, parece bastante aceptable, cómodo y firme, el tamaño adecuado
reviews.reviewText: Adecuado a lo descrito del producto
es un buen producto, sin embargo creo que debería ser un poco mas denso para generar mejor soporte
